text: Hoba Moshe a khutlele ho batho ba habo, a koatile le hona ho utloa bohloko; o ile a re: “Ke sebe sena seo le se entseng hoba ke tlohe ho lona. Le potlakisetsang kahlolo ea Mong`a lona? Ke moo a ileng a ptjhatlanya matlapa fats’e, a nyafutsa moena’e Aarone ka moriri hloohong, a mo hulela ho eena. Eena a re: “mora oa ‘Me ’! Ruri batho bana ba ile ba nkuka ke se letho, ba batlile ba mpolaea. Oho, se etse hore lira tsa ka li thabele malimabe a ka, u se ke oa mpalla har’a baetsa-libe!”
